channel.title: Course Introduction - 2023-2024 :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script [Slide 1] Hello and welcome to the Cyber Pipeline program! My name is Russ Feldhausen, and I’ll be one of the instructors for this program. [Slide 2] There are many other instructors for this program that you may see in the tutorial videos. They all have been instrumental in the development of this program. You’ll see me, along with many of my colleagues at Kansas State University, in the videos throughout this course.
